original_text: But Jesus knew what those people were thinking. He said to them, ‘If armies in a country start to fight each other, they will destroy their own country. If people in one family fight against each other, they will destroy their own family.
korean_text: 예수께서 그들의 생각을 아시고 이르시되 스스로 분쟁하는 나라마다 황폐하여지며 스스로 분쟁하는 집은 무너지느니라

sentences.original_text: If armies in a country start to fight each other
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 나라의 군대들이 서로 싸우기 시작하면

sentences.original_text: they will destroy their own country
If people in one family fight against each other
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 가족의 사람들이 서로 싸우면

sentences.original_text: they will destroy their own family
